# Draw Commands Complete reference for Vista Graphics draw commands. ## Shape Commands - **line**: Draw a line - **box**: Draw a rectangle - **circle**: Draw a circle - **ellipse**: Draw an ellipse - **polygon**: Draw a polygon - **arc**: Draw an arc - **point**: Draw a point ## Path Commands - **path**: Create a path - **move**: Move to position - **line**: Draw line to position - **curve**: Draw curve - **close**: Close path ## State Commands - **pen**: Set pen color/style - **fill**: Set fill color/style - **push**: Save state - **pop**: Restore state ## See Also - [API Reference](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/) - All graphics APIs - [Drawing](/wiki/graphics/drawing/) - Drawing reference
